titan_fight_system.description: Turn-based d6 combat system for fighting Titans from monsters_and_bosses.json
titan_fight_system.updated_mechanics: Simplified d6 system for faster combat

2-3.description: Standard attack - uses character's class main attribute

4-5.description: Heavy attack - main attribute multiplied by roll result (4 or 5)
Heavy attack - Attack multiplied by roll result (4 or 5)

6.description: Critical attack - Attack multiplied by Defense

attack_scaling.description: Titan attacks are 20% stronger than base monster stats

titan_selection.description: Randomly selects any boss-type enemy from monsters_and_bosses.json regardless of rarity and multiplies health by 2.5x for titan encounters

item_rewards.description: Player receives 1-2 random items from transformation_items.json matching the defeated titan's rarity

integration_notes.monsters_bosses_integration: This system pulls from the 'bosses' section of monsters_and_bosses.json with no rarity restrictions
integration_notes.character_stats_source: Player MainStat value comes from character's class-based main attribute (including equipment bonuses)
integration_notes.enemy_stats_source: Enemy Attack and Defense values come from monster/boss data
integration_notes.recommended_player_level: Players should have MainStat of at least 15 for lower-tier titan fights
